About Me

Let Me Tell You About Myself

My name is Lukas Weber and I would like to tell you a little bit about me. I am currently studying for my Master's degree in Business Informatics at Reutlingen University. Besides that I work as a working student in the team for public clients at Advanced UniByte GmbH in Metzingen. My spare time I spend with programming (mainly web programming) and sports. In 2019 I ran the Stockholm Marathon. I am always looking for new challenges, cracking them is a lot of fun.

Reutlingen, Deutschland

14. October 1996

Technik-Akademie Tübingen

The Technology Academy is part of the support programme for particularly gifted pupils set up by the Baden-Württemberg Ministry of Culture, Youth and Sports.

Schüler-Ingenieurs-Akademie

The Schüler-Ingenieurs-Akademie is a cooperation between JKG and companies in the Reutlingen area. Implementation of a project for independent Development of a hydrogen powered car.

Projekt LuMaPa

Development of a web-based 3D browser game. Based on the classic Temple Run.

lumapa-game.de
